channel.title: Rvest on Technocracy
channel.description: Recent content in Rvest on Technocracy

item.title: Mobile Device Specifications from GSMArena
item.description: Prologue GSMArena is a gadget review website with a focus on cellular and mobile devices. I believe to have come across the site a long time ago through the now defunct iGoogle start-page. It was among the first few tech blogs among the likes of How-To Geek, XDA Developers, Android Police, and AnandTech that had invoked in me the sort of enthusiasm for gadgets and devices that I have carried on ever since.
